dealmanager

Class Deal

  • java.lang.Object
    • dealmanager.Deal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PurchaseRecord, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PurchaseRecord>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GrandMasterDeal, MagicDeal

    public class Deal
extends java.lang.Object
implements PurchaseRecord, java.io.Serializable
    The Transaction class is a record of deals made between two parties.
    Version:
    1.0 11/3/2018
    Author:
    Joseph Varilla
